p: The recorded data in Table 5 shows the total n − 3 PUFA was significantly decreased while the ratio of n − 6 to n − 3 PUFA was significantly increased in the femur of DC rats. Similar observations were noticed in the DMET group. Remarkably, the total bone n − 3 PUFA increased and the n − 6 to n − 3 ratio decreased in the DFD group.
